jd: From: Krish, CodersAmerica krish@codersamerica.com Reply to: krish@codersamerica.com Hi,Hope you are doing great!!please send me an updated copy of your resume and below details.No H1B CandidatesPosition:.Net DeveloperLocation:Charlotte, NCDuration:Long termClient : Capgemini/LPLJob Description:Required Skillset:ASP.Net Core Web API: Extensive experience in designing and developing RESTful APIs using ASP.Net Core.C#.Net: Strong proficiency in C# and .Net framework, with a deep understanding of object-oriented programming principles.Angular: Proficient in Angular for front-end development, with a solid understanding of TypeScript, HTML, and CSS.AWS Lambda: Experience in building and deploying serverless applications using AWS Lambda.AWS RDS Postgres: Proficiency in managing and optimizing PostgreSQL databases in AWS RDSAWS EKS Cluster: Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and managing containerized applications in AWS EKS.CI/CD: Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment practices and tools* Good communication and interpersonal skills.If you are interested in this job position mentioned please respond with your resume in MS word format with these details.Full Name:Current Location:Contact No (Cell Number):Email ID:Skype id:Linkedin id:Visa Status:Availability:Currently on Project (Y/N):Open to relocate:Last 4 digits of SSN:Passport No:Total Exp:US Exp:Rate:Last 2 References:Reference Name:Reference Email id:Designation:Contact No:Reference Email id:Designation:Contact No:Thanks & Regards,KrishKumar,Senior IT RecruiterCodersAmericaKrish@CodersAmerica.com
